titleStmt.title: Patròs kat́optra kan paidòs gonyklisiá: = The father's spectacles to behold his child by and the child's cushion to kneel before his parents. By a lover of parental and filial unity.
titleStmt.author: Lover of parental and filial unity.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Astwood for the author,

notesStmt.note: Initial words of title transliterated from the Greek.
Copy cataloged closely trimmed with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
